case_title: MISRI BAI vs INCOME-TAX OFFICER, HYDERABAD
legal_representative: MISRI BAI (wife of late Rameshwar Pershad)

key_points.issue: No notice of demand served as required under the Income-tax Act, 1922 or 1961.
key_points.judgment: Income-tax Officer must serve notice under Section 156 of the Income-tax Act, 1961 in Form No. 7 before proceeding with tax recovery or penalty.

direction: Respondent to forbear from taking further proceedings unless notice is served as prescribed.
